welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Madryn! Nestled along the beautiful Patagonian coast, this charming city is known for its stunning beaches, wildlife, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Puerto Madryn has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Havanna
restaurants.description: Havanna is a café located in Puerto Madryn.
restaurants.address: Av. Roca y 28 de Julio (esq. 28 de Julio), 9120 Puerto Madryn, Chubut

restaurants.name: Bodegón El Madero
restaurants.description: Bodegón El Madero is a argentinian restaurant located in Puerto Madryn.
restaurants.address: 25 de Mayo 409 (esq. 9 de Julio), U9120 Puerto Madryn, Chubut

restaurants.name: Cantina El Náutico
restaurants.description: Cantina El Náutico is a seafood restaurant located in Puerto Madryn.
restaurants.address: Av. Julio Argentino Roca 790 (esq. Lugones), 9120 Puerto Madryn, Chubut

restaurants.name: Buenos Hermanos
restaurants.description: Buenos Hermanos is a argentinian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Náutico Bistró de Mar
restaurants.description: Náutico Bistró de Mar is a seafood restaurant located in Puerto Madryn.
restaurants.address: Bv. Almte Brown 860, 9120 Puerto Madryn, Chubut
